drupalNodeEvent.title: Book Launch of 𝗕𝗲𝘆𝗼𝗻𝗱 𝗣𝗮𝗻-𝗔𝘀𝗶𝗮𝗻𝗶𝘀𝗺: 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝗻𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗖𝗵𝗶𝗻𝗮 & 𝗜𝗻𝗱𝗶𝗮, 𝟭𝟴𝟰𝟬𝘀-𝟭𝟵𝟲𝟬𝘀

field_speakers.processed: Prof. Tansen Sen (NYU Shanghai), Dr Brian Tsui (The Hongkong Polytechnic University), Dr. Yin Cao (Tsinghua University, Beijing), Dr. Adhira Mangalagiri (Queen Mary University of London), Dr. Anne Reinhardt (Williams College, Massachusetts), Dr. Zhang Ke (Fudan University, China)

field_organizers.processed: Institute of Chinese Studies, Delhi, Indian Council of World Affairs, New Delhi and Jawaharlal Nehru University, Delhi

field_description.processed: The Book 'Beyond Pan-Asianism: Connecting China and India, 1840s-1960s' edited by Prof. Tansen Sen and Dr. Brian Tsui, covers a tremendous breadth of figures, including novelists, soldiers & intelligence officers, by deploying published & archival materials in multiple Asian & Western languages & attempts to answer how China–India connections in modern period should be narrated
